mapper.select: SELECT member.member_no, member_id, member_pw, member_mname, member_phonenumber, car.car_no, car_id, car_type FROM member JOIN car ON member.member_no = car.member_no WHERE member_id = #{member_id} and member_pw = #{member_pw}
mapper.insert: insert into member (member_no, member_id, member_pw, member_mname, member_phonenumber) values ((select nvl(max(member_no),0)+1 from member), #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_mname}, #{member_phonenumber})
mapper.select: select * from member order by to_number(member_no) asc

SELECT reservation_no, bodyshop_no, repaired_person, reservation_time, repaired_time, key FROM RESERVATION JOIN MEMBER ON RESERVATION.member_no = MEMBER.member_no WHERE MEMBER.member_no = (select member_no from member where member_id= #{member_id}) ORDER BY reservation_no
mapper.update: update member set member_phonenumber=#{member_phonenumber} where member_id =#{member_id}
